# Transform to Numeric | Test/Training Dataframes

```{r}
# df_hate_corr <- char2numeric(df_hate_crime)

add_frequency_encoding <- function(data) {
  for (col in names(data)) {
    # Compute frequencies
    frequency_map <- table(data[[col]],useNA = "always")
    
    # Create a new column with frequency encoding
    new_col_name <- paste0(col, "_frequency")
    data[[new_col_name]] <- frequency_map[data[[col]]]
  }
  
  return(data)
}

# Use the function to add frequency encoding columns
test <- add_frequency_encoding(df_hate_training)

# View the result
print(df_hate_training)
```

#Checking to see if we need to weight anything
```{r}
# Fit a linear regression model with all variables
lm_model <- lm(Anti_semitic_crimes ~ ., data = df_hate_training)

# Extract residuals
residuals_all <- residuals(lm_model)

# Plot residuals for each predictor variable
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))  # Set up a 2x2 grid for subplots

for (variable in names(df_hate_training)) {
  if (variable != "Anti_semitic_crimes") {  # Exclude the response variable
    plot(df_hate_training[[variable]], residuals_all,
         main = paste("Residuals vs", variable),
         xlab = variable, ylab = "Residuals")
  }
}

# Reset the plotting parameters
par(mfrow = c(1, 1))
```
